name: Streaming beam Python structured DLP flex template
description: Streaming beam Python structured DLP flex template with support for global and regional resources.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input PubSub subscription.
parameters.helpText: Name of the input PubSub subscription to consume from. Format is 'projects/<PROJECT>/subscriptions/<SUBSCRIPTION>.'

parameters.name: input_topic
parameters.label: Input PubSub Topic.
parameters.helpText: Name of the input PubSub Topic to consume from. Format is 'projects/<PROJECT>/topics/<TOPIC>'

parameters.name: dlp_location
parameters.label: DLP Location.
parameters.helpText: The Location of the DLP resources.

parameters.name: dlp_project
parameters.label: DLP Project.
parameters.helpText: ID of the project that holds the DLP template.

parameters.name: bq_schema
parameters.label: BigQuery table schema.
parameters.helpText: Output BigQuery table schema specified as a string

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: BigQuery output table name.
parameters.helpText: Output BigQuery table for results specified as: PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE or DATASET.TABLE.
